member.name: COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_TYPE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the status of a compositor frame.

member.name: COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_TYPE.COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_CREATED
member.summary: The compositor has started working on the frame.

member.name: COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_TYPE.COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_CONFIRMED
member.summary: CPU work is completed and any presents have taken place.

member.name: COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_TYPE.COMPOSITION_FRAME_ID_COMPLETED
member.summary: GPU work is completed for all render targets associated with the frame.
